html:
News Releases, Media Advisories

 

 Media Advisory to Editors, Correspondents, Broadcasters:

        The Federal Election Commission has scheduled a special open meeting for Tuesday, September 12, 2000, at 2 p.m. to discuss matters relating to Public Funding of Presidential Campaigns and candidates of the Reform Party.

        The meeting will be in the Commission's 9th floor hearing room, 999 E. St. NW. Agenda documents are available from the FEC Press Office (694-1220) or on the FEC Web Site, www.fec.gov.

Broadcast entities are requested to call the FEC Press office by 4 p.m. Monday (Sept. 11) for instructions on access to the building and the hearing room.

# # #
title: FEC to Hold Special Open Meeting on September 12, 2000
